  • Constructor Details

    • MyDodo

      public MyDodo()

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act()
      Overrides:
      act in class greenfoot.Actor

    • move

      public void move()
      Move one cell forward in the current direction.

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere in the world

      Final: If possible, Dodo has moved forward one cell

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove()
      Test if Dodo can move forward, (there are no obstructions or end of world in the cell in front of her).

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere in the world

      Final: Same as initial situation

      Returns:
      boolean true if Dodo can move (no obstructions ahead) false if Dodo can't move (an obstruction or end of world ahead)

    • hatchEgg

      public void hatchEgg()
      Hatches the egg in the current cell by removing the egg from the cell. Gives an error message if there is no egg

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere in the world. There is an egg in Dodo's cell.

      Final: Dodo is in the same cell. The egg has been removed (hatched).

    • getNrOfEggsHatched

      public int getNrOfEggsHatched()
      Returns the number of eggs Dodo has hatched so far.
      Returns:
      int number of eggs hatched by Dodo

    • jump

      public void jump(int distance)
      Move given number of cells forward in the current direction.

      Initial:

      Final:

      param int distance: the number of steps made

    • walkToWorldEdgePrintingCoordinates

      public void walkToWorldEdgePrintingCoordinates()
      Walks to edge of the world printing the coordinates at each step

      Initial: Dodo is on West side of world facing East.

      Final: Dodo is on East side of world facing East. Coordinates of each cell printed in the console.

    • canLayEgg

      public boolean canLayEgg()
      Test if Dodo can lay an egg. (there is not already an egg in the cell)

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere in the world

      Final: Same as initial situation

      Returns:
      boolean true if Dodo can lay an egg (no egg there) false if Dodo can't lay an egg (already an egg in the cell)

    • turn180

      public void turn180()
      Makes the Dodo turn 180 degrees to the right.

      Initial: Dodo is facing any direction

      Final: Dodo is now facing the opposite direction of initial situation

    • climbOverFence

      public void climbOverFence()
      Makes the Dodo climb over a fence. (if there is one)

      Initial: Dodo is standing in front of a fence

      Final: Dodo is on the other side of the fence

    • grainAhead

      public boolean grainAhead()
      Test if the Dodo has a grain ahead.

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere on the world

      Final: Same as initial situation

      Returns:
      boolean true if there is a grain in front false if there is no grain in front

    • goToEgg

      public void goToEgg(Egg egg)
      Makes the Dodo move towards an egg. (and picks it up)

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere on the world

      Final: Dodo has moved to the given egg (and picks that egg up, updating the scoreboard)

      Parameters:
      Egg - egg = an egg on the world

    • printFenceLocation

      public void printFenceLocation()
      Prints out the coordinates of all the fences on the world.

      Initial: Dodo and fences are somewhere on the world

      Final: Same as initial situation

    • nearestEgg

      public Egg nearestEgg()
      Finds the nearest egg to the Dodo.

      Initial: Dodo and eggs are somewhere on the world

      Final: Same as initial situation

      Returns:
      Egg = the closest egg to the Dodo

    • lowerScore

      public void lowerScore()
      The steps the Dodo has taken and the score of Eggs will get updated. (if possible)

      Initial: Dodo (and eggs) is somewhere on the world

      Final: Same as initial situation

    • collectAllEggs

      public void collectAllEggs()
      The Dodo will move and collect all the Eggs until its steps run out

      Initial: Dodo (and eggs) is somewhere on the world

      Final: Dodo will have moved and picked up eggs on the way
